text.autoconfig.agingmobs.title: Aging Mobs
text.autoconfig.agingmobs.option.mob_agi: Whether Mobs should Visually Grow Up.
text.autoconfig.agingmobs.option.grow_hi:
Whether when Mobs Visually grow up to also grow their Hitbox

This is off by default because growing the hitbox breaks
some vanilla farms that depend on mob height.
text.autoconfig.agingmobs.option.only.@T: Which Mobs to allow to Visually Grow Up.
